```lisp
['(:action choose ; General action for selecting or preparing an item
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?container - container)
    :precondition (and
        (available ?agent)
        (not (selected ?item))
        (or (visible ?agent)
            (nails_prepared ?agent)
            (open ?container)
            (disorganized ?item)
            (at ?agent storage_area)
            (at ?agent ?item))
        (or (bare ?agent)
            (empty ?container)
            (dirty ?item)
            (unselected ?item)))
    :effect (and
        (selected ?item)
        (or (camouflaged ?agent)
            (nails_whitened ?agent)
            (size_chosen ?container)
            (organized ?item)
            (fuller ?container)
            (clean ?item)
            (in_inventory ?agent ?item)))
(:action clean
  :parameters (?entity - object ?agent - agent)
  :precondition (and 
      (requires_cleaning ?entity) 
      (can_clean ?agent ?entity))
  :effect (and 
      (cleaned ?entity)
      (not (requires_cleaning ?entity))))
(:action use ; Use a resource for a specific task
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?resource - object ?target - object)
    :precondition (and 
                    (available ?resource) 
                    (not (used ?resource ?target))
                    (requires_treatment ?target))
    :effect (and 
              (used ?resource ?target)
              (treated ?target ?resource)
              (not (requires_treatment ?target))))
(:action wipe
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?target - object ?tool - tool)
    :precondition (and
        (available ?agent)
        (at ?agent ?target)
        (not (clean ?target))
        (in_hand ?agent ?tool)
        (suitable_for_wiping ?tool ?target))
    :effect (and
        (clean ?target)
        (dirty ?tool)
        (not (in_hand ?agent ?tool))))
(:action add ; Add an item to a container or apply a layer to an object
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - object ?target - object)
  :precondition (and (prepared ?target) (selected ?item))
  :effect (and (modified ?target) (not (prepared ?target))))
(:action make ; General action to create or modify objects and states
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?item1 - object ?item2 - object)
  :precondition (and 
    (in_inventory ?agent ?item1)
    (available ?item2)
    (not (completed ?item1)))
  :effect (and 
    (completed ?item1)
    (organized ?item1)
    (not (available ?item2))))
(:action avoid ; Avoid using a resource and preserve its associated state
 :parameters (?actor - agent ?resource - object ?related_entity - agent)
 :precondition (and (available ?resource) (related ?actor ?related_entity))
 :effect (and (not (used ?resource))))
(:action chip ; Chip or hasten the drying of a nail polish
   :parameters (?entity - object ?tool - object)
   :precondition (and (applied ?entity) (available ?tool) (not (final_state ?entity)))
   :effect (and (altered ?entity) (not (available ?tool))))
(:action condition
   :parameters (?entity - object ?target - object ?tool - object)
   :precondition (and (prepared ?target) (inventory ?entity ?tool))
   :effect (and (conditioned ?target) (not (inventory ?entity ?tool))))
(:action treat
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?area - area)
    :precondition (and
                    (requires_treatment ?area)
                    (has_item ?agent ?item))
    :effect (and
              (treated_area ?area ?item)
              (not (requires_treatment ?area))))
(:action dry
  :parameters (?entity - object ?method - method)
  :precondition (and 
    (requires_drying ?entity)
    (method_applicable ?method ?entity))
  :effect (and 
    (dried ?entity)
    (not (requires_drying ?entity))))
(:action open ; Open a container and update its state
    :parameters (?entity - object ?opener - agent)
    :precondition (and (at ?opener ?entity) (closed ?entity))
    :effect (and (open ?entity) (not (closed ?entity))))
(:action take ; Take a resource and update its status
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (accessible ?actor ?item) (not (taken ?actor ?item)))
    :effect (and (taken ?actor ?item)))
(:action apply_polish
    :parameters (?p - agent ?nail - object ?product - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (clean ?nail)
        (selected ?product)
        (or (bare ?nail) (foundation_cured ?nail) (regular_polish_dried ?nail)))
    :effect (and 
        (not (bare ?nail))))
(:action reuse
  :parameters (?user - agent ?resource - object)
  :precondition (and 
    (available ?resource)
    (clean ?resource)
    (not (in_use ?resource))
    (ready ?user))
  :effect (and
    (in_use ?resource)
    (not (available ?resource))))']
```
